text: "Fuckin' Problems" is the third single off American rapper ASAP Rocky's debut studio album Long. Live. ASAP. The song was released on October 24, 2012. The song also features Drake, 2 Chainz and Kendrick Lamar. On December 3, 2012, a music video for the song was released. It debuted on 106 & Park. The song was nominated for Best Rap Song at the 56th Grammy Awards but lost to Macklemore's Thrift Shop. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Fuckin Problems" on YouTube Category:2012 songs Category:Drake (musician) songs
title: Fuckin' Problems
